channel.title: Netlify on Shiyi's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Netlify on Shiyi's Blog

item.title: Finally Works
item.description: This is the first time I try to set up a blog. I have to say it is so hard. The framework I choosed Hugo, it is good, at least for now. The real problem is about hosting. Though Hugo gives several ways to host the blog, it turns out to be very difficult. For hosting server I first used VM from Google cloud platform, but I met some really confusing issues about deploying the blog.
